title: Both sold SGC 3 Matty Portrait and SGC 3 Tinker knees SOLD
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Both sold SGC 3 Matty Portrait and SGC 3 Tinker knees SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
I’m trying to finish off my HOFer set, so trying to put some cash together to land the Cobb Bat On and Crawford Throwing. Looking to move this Matty portrait, as i was able to replace it in the backs line. I needed the P350 slot for one of the 350 Only HOFers.

Two surface wrinkles on his left shoulder and a little dirt spot on his forehead.

Matty Port TRADED
Tinker Knees $$$0LD

I would consider P42 HOFers or a T213-1 HOFer in trade, but cash buyer would have rights to it if trade isn’t finalized beforehand.

I hope everyone is enjoying the weekend,
Bob

Shoot me a PM if interested

Prices drops and combined the two older posts.
Thanks,
Bob
